note.text: When working in a different culture, one of the best things individuals can do to increase the chance of success is to build rapport with their host country counterparts.

Building rapport or building relationships has many advantages. It can help individuals to better understand the new culture and combat culture shock. It can help build trust and a friendly working environment, as humans are generally more willing to work with people that they know and like.
Building rapport takes time and effort. In the next few pages, we will go through some things that you should be aware of when building rapport.
